This episode I show you how to make some simple scatter terrain for your jungle encounters or overgrown ruins. A simple project to add some interesting aesthetics and dynamics to your dungeons and dragons game. 















Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft

Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

title: Jungle Scatter Terrain For D&D Tutorial (Black Magic Craft Episode 039)
